snippet.title: Superposition - New game!
snippet.description:
Hey everyone, thanks for sticking around! I've released my first commercial game! You can purchase it either on Steam or itch.io and it would mean a lot to me if you did. Links below:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1825540/Superposition/
https://dustinbragg.itch.io/superposition
Follow me: https://twitter.com/DustinLBragg

Superposition is a simple sokoban style puzzle game about duplication. By splitting yourself into multiple copies you have to maneuver onto all goal tiles simultaneously to progress.

The goal with this game was to iterate on a few novel mechanics in a sokoban world, and play with the consequences to discover interesting scenarios. The game contains 50 puzzles that intend to fully explore those mechanics.
